scenes.text: As the first light of dawn gently kissed the forest, I awoke to the soothing rustle of leaves and the soft melody of birds. Peace wrapped around me like a warm embrace.
scenes.image: /story-game/story_1_scene_1_level_1.png
scenes.caption: Dawn in the Woods

scenes.text: I walked along a winding forest path, the gentle breeze carrying whispers of nature’s secrets. Every step lightened my heart, and the world seemed to breathe with me.
scenes.image: /story-game/story_1_scene_2_level_1.png
scenes.caption: Forest Path

scenes.text: At the forest’s edge, a shimmering waterfall cascaded into a serene pool. The rhythmic murmur invited me to let go of all worries.
scenes.image: /story-game/story_1_scene_3_level_1.png
scenes.caption: Waterfall

scenes.text: The city awoke softly as the morning light caressed the tall buildings, and a gentle calm filled the quiet streets.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><defs><linearGradient id='cityMorning' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFE0B2'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFCC80'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='300' height='200' fill='url(#cityMorning)'/><rect x='20' y='80' width='40' height='120' fill='#6D4C41'/><rect x='80' y='60' width='50' height='140' fill='#5D4037'/></svg>
scenes.caption: City at Dawn

scenes.text: The gentle hum of early traffic and the soft murmur of conversations created a comforting urban lullaby.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><defs><linearGradient id='urbanLullaby' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFECB3'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFE082'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='300' height='200' fill='url(#urbanLullaby)'/><rect x='150' y='90' width='40' height='110' fill='#8D6E63'/></svg>
scenes.caption: Urban Lullaby

scenes.text: On a quiet rooftop, soft sunlight danced on glass and concrete, casting a warm and hopeful glow over the city.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><defs><linearGradient id='rooftopGlow' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#CFD8DC'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#B0BEC5'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='300' height='200' fill='url(#rooftopGlow)'/><rect x='0' y='150' width='300' height='50' fill='#455A64'/></svg>
scenes.caption: Rooftop Glow

scenes.text: The rugged mountains stood tall as the sunrise painted the peaks in soft hues, filling the air with wonder.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><defs><linearGradient id='mountainSunrise' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFCDD2'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#E57373'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='300' height='200' fill='url(#mountainSunrise)'/><polygon points='50,150 100,50 150,150' fill='#8D6E63'/></svg>
scenes.caption: Mountain Sunrise

scenes.text: A winding trail beckoned, leading into the heart of the mountains where nature whispered its secrets.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><defs><linearGradient id='mountainTrail' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#E0F7FA'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#B2EBF2'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='300' height='200' fill='url(#mountainTrail)'/><path d='M30,200 Q150,100 270,200' stroke='#795548' stroke-width='8' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round'/></svg>
scenes.caption: Mountain Trail

scenes.text: At the peak, a serene silence reigned as snow gently blanketed the rugged terrain, offering a moment of calm majesty.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><defs><linearGradient id='snowGradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#E1F5FE'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#B3E5FC'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='300' height='200' fill='url(#snowGradient)'/><polygon points='100,180 150,80 200,180' fill='#ECEFF1'/></svg>
scenes.caption: Summit Silence

scenes.text: In a secret garden, flowers sang soft melodies and vibrant colors filled the air like a gentle symphony.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#D1C4E9'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#4A148C' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Garden Scene 1</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Melody of Flowers

scenes.text: Butterflies danced lazily as the gentle breeze carried the scent of blooming magic, inviting curious hearts to explore.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#D1C4E9'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#4A148C' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Garden Scene 2</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Dancing Butterflies

scenes.text: At the heart of the garden, ancient trees whispered secrets of nature’s timeless magic.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#D1C4E9'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#4A148C' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Garden Scene 3</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Whispers of Nature

scenes.text: A vibrant rainbow appeared in the sky, its colors telling a story of hope and hidden wonders.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#FFECB3'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#FF6F00' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Rainbow Scene 1</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Rainbow Arches

scenes.text: Its brilliant colors whispered secrets of far-off lands and magical treasures awaiting discovery.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#FFECB3'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#FF6F00' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Rainbow Scene 2</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Secrets of Color

scenes.text: At its end, the rainbow promised a treasure trove of smiles and gentle surprises.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#FFECB3'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#FF6F00' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Rainbow Scene 3</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Treasure of Smiles

scenes.text: A playful cloud drifted lazily across a bright sky, forming curious shapes that sparked giggles among onlookers.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#B3E5FC'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#0277BD' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Cloud Scene 1</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Playful Cloud

scenes.text: Its ever-changing form invited children to imagine fantastical creatures and dreamy adventures.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#B3E5FC'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#0277BD' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Cloud Scene 2</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Dreamy Shapes

scenes.text: The gentle wonder of the cloud filled the day with quiet dreams and soft smiles.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#B3E5FC'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#0277BD' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Cloud Scene 3</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Quiet Dreams

stories.title: The Adventure of the Friendly Dragon

scenes.text: A kind dragon soared over a peaceful village, its gentle eyes and warm smile inviting everyone to a day of fun.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#FFE082'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#F57F17' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Dragon Scene 1</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Friendly Dragon

scenes.text: The dragon played with children in the village square, sharing stories of ancient magic and secret valleys.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#FFE082'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#F57F17' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Dragon Scene 2</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Village Play

scenes.text: Together they discovered a hidden valley filled with laughter and friendship—a magical place where every heart found its home.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#FFE082'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#F57F17' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Dragon Scene 3</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Valley of Friendship

scenes.text: Deep within the enchanted forest, magic sparkled in every leaf and every whisper of the wind was filled with wonder.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#C5E1A5'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#33691E' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Forest Scene 1</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Forest Magic

scenes.text: Mystical creatures roamed gently, guiding lost travelers and sharing ancient stories of the forest's heart.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#C5E1A5'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#33691E' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Forest Scene 2</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Mystical Creatures

scenes.text: The forest offered a haven of calm and wonder—a secret retreat where every step led to gentle surprises.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#C5E1A5'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#33691E' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Forest Scene 3</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Secret Retreat

scenes.text: A small boat carried curious children to a mysterious island where friendly animals and hidden secrets awaited.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#B3E5FC'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#01579B' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Island Scene 1</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Mysterious Arrival

scenes.text: The island revealed gentle puzzles and friendly creatures that helped the children discover its many secrets.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#B3E5FC'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#01579B' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Island Scene 2</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Friendly Secrets

scenes.text: As the sun set, the island glowed with an otherworldly charm, teaching the children that adventure can be gentle and full of wonder.
scenes.image: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='200'><rect width='300' height='200' fill='#B3E5FC'/><text x='50%' y='50%' fill='#01579B' font-size='16' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'>Island Scene 3</text></svg>
scenes.caption: Sunset Charm
